bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XXI (Nos 2288-2308)

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: Lobel Edgar, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Part XXI (Nos 2288-2308). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1951, 8°, xiii-149 pp. et XIII pll.

C.R. par John A. Davison, JHS 74 (1954) p. 206. - Édouard des Places, Orientalia N.S., 23 (1954) p. 96. - Eva-Maria Hamm, Gnomon 26 (1954) pp. 453-456. - Marcel Hombert, AntCl 22 (1953) pp. 237-238. - Rudolf Keydell, Prolegomena 2 (1953) pp. 133-136. - Richmond Lattimore, AJP 75 (1954) pp. 214-216. - D.L. Page, CR N.S., 4 (1954) pp. 24-27. - Dino Pieraccioni, Maia 5 (1952) pp. 130-137. - Edoardo Volterra, Iura 3 (1952) pp. 384-386.
